PHRASE.LANG: Contains ten Ring-bikes: the Black Scorpion, White Tiger, Red Stallion, Golden Phoenix, Fuschia Bloom, Black Venom, Red Devil, White Bear, Silver Angel and Golden Shuriken. [#Legal]
